channel.title: How to change NPC's damage?
channel.description: I heard (i think) 2 times how to do this, but i didn't really understand. Can anyone tell me how to do it(it = changing NPC's damage they do when they attack)??

item.title: How to change NPC's damage?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

code=java] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 87) { // rat hitDiff = misc.random(2);
in npchandler.java find that and just make another one. also, hitDiff is the max dmg and misc.random(2) is where it will get the dmg from.

Read full topic

change the combat level, it determines the max hit

item.title: How to change NPC's damage?
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Erm…Bin? Erm…NPC, microsoft outlook file? Outlook is an e-mail program. LOL!! Could anyone explain it better please?

And if u mean .cfg, i only got one called npc, that looks like this:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat–health
npc = 0 Hans 0 0

Read full topic

item.title: How to change NPC's damage?
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

Go to your source, go to bin and go to npcs. Open up npc list, it should be a microsoft outlook file. Open it up and find the npc you want, or you can add it.

it should look similar to this

// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND
npc = 50 276 240 25 2 8 90 91 89 92 King_Black_Dragon A_fierce_dragon_with_black_scales.

see where the MH is, that is Max hit, change that number to watever, then restart your client.

Read full topic
